VRMonitor_Overview_QuickLinks_Tutorial_D: Learn to use your VR Headset
Settings_Audio_HDMIGain: Enable Gain reduction on VIVE HDMI Audio
Settings_Audio_AudioMirrorUnsupported: Audio mirroring is not supported on this platform
Settings_EnableWebHelperDebuggerDesc: Enables debugging server for attaching Chromium dev tools and debugger to embedded Chromium pages. SteamVR restart is required.
Advanced_PerfGraphInHMD: Show GPU Performance Graph in Headset
Explanation_DisableEnhancedPowerManageme: Disable Windows Enhanced Power Management for SteamVR USB Devices if you experience mysterious loss of tracking or inability to pair wireless controllers.
Explanation_QuickCalibrate: Quickly reset your Room Setup. For Standing and Room Scale VR new bounds will be centered on your headset on the floor in the center of your space.
Explanation_RebootVive: Reboot your Vive headset - this may fix USB related headset issues.
Explanation_RemoveAllSteamVRUSBDevices: Remove all USB devices related to SteamVR from this system to reinstall drivers.
Explanation_ResetDismissableWarnings: Temporary warnings are reset and will show again as needed.
Settings_DebugInputBindings: Enable debugging options in the input binding user interface
Settings_HomeAppDesc: The new SteamVR Home experience supports richer home spaces, social features, and more. This feature is currently in Beta, please provide feedback on the forums.
Settings_LockedModeDesc: Allow rendering to headset while workstation is locked.
Settings_NightModeDesc: Night Mode dims the headset until 5:00 AM (or until SteamVR is restarted).
Settings_NotificationDoNotDisturb_Info: When Do Not Disturb is enabled, incoming notifications will be suppressed.
Settings_PauseOnStandby: Pause rendering when headset is idle
Settings_StartSteamVROnAppLaunch: Start SteamVR when an application starts
Settings_StatusWindowAlwaysOnTop_Text: SteamVR Status window always on top
Settings_StatusWindowMinimizeToTray_Text: When minimized, SteamVR Status minimizes to the system tray
Settings_Video_AppResFooter: The current setting renders each eye at
Settings_Advanced_MotionSmoothing_Descri: When this is enabled, SteamVR synthesizes new frames to maintain a good experience when the running application cannot make framerate.
Settings_Advanced_MotionSmoothing_Disabl: Motion Smoothing requires asynchronous reprojection support.
Settings_Advanced_Supersampling_Warning: WARNING: The manual override below will affect all applications. To change the resolution for a specific application, use the Applications tab on the left.
Explanation_Supersampling_Header: SteamVR automatically sets your application resolution based on the performance of your GPU.
Explanation_Supersampling: *Some applications may need to be restarted for settings to take effect.
Settings_PerApplication_Header: Select a SteamVR Application for Per-Application Settings
Settings_PerApplication_AppResHeader: This setting is a multiplier on top of the current global application resolution setting on the Video tab to the left. This application may need to be restarted for settings to take effect. (Default is 100%)
Settings_PerApplication_AppResFooter: The current setting renders each eye at %1$s
Settings_PerApplication_OverlayVisibleHe: Overlay applications are available as tabs in the SteamVR Dashboard.
Settings_PerApplication_OverlayVisibleCh: Start this overlay application when SteamVR launches.
Settings_PerApplication_MotionSmoothing_: Use the checkbox below to override the global setting for Motion Smoothing for this application. (Global setting for Motion Smoothing is <font color=#eeeeee>%1</font>)
Enable Motion Smoothing for this application
Settings_MimeTypes_Pancake_Header: Select an application to launch 2D applications in
Settings_Camera_AllowCameraForRoomView: Allow Camera For Room View (System Button Double Click)
Settings_Camera_CompatibilityExplanation: If you experience a loss of tracking you may want to set a lower Camera Rate, disable the camera, or try a different USB port.
Settings_Appearance_UseDomeProjectionDes: Changes the projection style of the background image. Certain background use this feature to give a more immersive experience. If the background you selected looks distorted, try enabling this
Settings_Appearance_DomeCameraHeightDesc: Adjusts the height of the camera relative to the background
Settings_Appearance_DomeCameraRadiusDesc: Changes the size of the dome.
Settings_Appearance_PlayAreaColorDesc: This controls the color of the play area indicator below your feet.
Settings_Dashboard_ShowProgressIndicator: Show progress indicator for long press actions
Settings_Appearance_Chaperone_CollisionB: This will cause Chaperone to always show the floor boundary, even when you are a safe distance from it. Walls will continue to appear based on distance as usual.
